Alias.name: Make gate
Alias.script:
--syntax: makegate xxx
weaving = weaving or {} weaving.gatename = matches[2]
send("embrace") send("seize") send("channel 'gate'")

Alias.name: Gate to
Alias.script:
--syntax: gate xxx
local location = matches[2]
char = char or {} gatecodes = {}
if char.name then if io.exists(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/"..char.name.."_gatecodes.lua") then table.load(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/"..char.name.."_gatecodes.lua", gatecodes) end if gatecodes[location] then send("embrace") send("seize") send("channel 'gate' " .. gatecodes[location]) else cecho("<red>Unknown error! No code known for this location.\n") end else cecho("<red>Error! Character name not known.\n") end

Alias.name: Delete gates
View codes
Alias.script:
--syntax: viewcodes
char = char or {} gatecodes = {}
if char.name then if io.exists(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/" .. char.name .. "_gatecodes.lua") then table.load(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/" .. char.name .. "_gatecodes.lua", gatecodes) end if table.is_empty(gatecodes) then cecho("No gatecodes known!
") else for k, v in pairs(gatecodes) do cecho("Location: " .. k .. ", code: " .. v .. "
") end end else cecho("<red>Error! Character name not known.
") end
